properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.configuration
properties.description: Component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.arangodb.ArangoDbConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.document-collection
properties.description: Collection name, when using ArangoDb as a Document Database. Set the documentCollection name when using the CRUD operation on the document database collections (SAVE_DOCUMENT , FIND_DOCUMENT_BY_KEY, UPDATE_DOCUMENT, DELETE_DOCUMENT).

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.edge-collection
properties.description: Collection name of vertices, when using ArangoDb as a Graph Database. Set the edgeCollection name to perform CRUD operation on edges using these operations : SAVE_VERTEX, FIND_VERTEX_BY_KEY, UPDATE_VERTEX, DELETE_VERTEX. The graph attribute is mandatory.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the arangodb component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.graph
properties.description: Graph name, when using ArangoDb as a Graph Database. Combine this attribute with one of the two attributes vertexCollection and edgeCollection.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.host
properties.description: ArangoDB host. If host and port are default, this field is Optional.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.operation
properties.description: Operations to perform on ArangoDb. For the operation AQL_QUERY, no need to specify a collection or graph.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.password
properties.description: ArangoDB password. If user and password are default, this field is Optional.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.port
properties.description: ArangoDB exposed port. If host and port are default, this field is Optional.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.user
properties.description: ArangoDB user. If user and password are default, this field is Optional.

properties.name: camel.component.arangodb.vertex-collection
properties.description: Collection name of vertices, when using ArangoDb as a Graph Database. Set the vertexCollection name to perform CRUD operation on vertices using these operations : SAVE_EDGE, FIND_EDGE_BY_KEY, UPDATE_EDGE, DELETE_EDGE. The graph attribute is mandatory.
